credit_line: Williams College Museum of Art, Prendergast Archive and Study Center, Gift of Mrs. Charles Prendergast
dimensions:
sheet: 11 x 8 1/2 in. (27.9 x 21.6 cm)
Other (envelope): 9.2 x 16.5 cm (3 5/8 x 6 1/2 in.)
title: Letter from Ira Glackens to Mr. and Mrs. Charles Prendergast (New York)
description: No letterhead. One two sided sheet with an envelope.  This letter describes to Eugenie and Charles Prendergast how Edith Glackens is faring after the death of her husband, and thanking them for their friendship.
